title: FinMin proposes changes to Finance Bill for crypto assets taxation - Business Standard
content:
1. FinMin proposes changes to Finance Bill for crypto assets taxation  Business Standard
  2. Govt proposes amendments to Finance Bill; seeks to tighten norms for cryptocurrency taxation  Times of India
  3. Finance Ministry proposes amendments to Finance Bill to tighten norms for Cryptocurrency taxation in India  PGurus
  4. First Mover Asia: With Finance Bill Vote, India Continues to Reckon With the Growing Crypto Industry; Bitcoin, Ether Tread Water  CoinDesk
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: FM Sitharaman is expected to move an amendment clarifying that no tax deduction or set off would be available in place of mining cost of crypto assets and other VDAs or losses from their transfer
